title: Region bounded by trig and exp functions part - c

content.question: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, the cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are semicircles with diameters extending from y=f(x) to y=g(x). Find the volume of this solid.

frqParts.text: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, the cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are semicircles with diameters extending from y=f(x) to y=g(x). Find the volume of this solid.

topic.text: 8.8: Volumes with Cross Sections - Triangles and Semicircles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
